name: Black Friday Technology Freak out
description:
Technology goes crazy in Black Friday. Grass cutters, drones, helicopters and IjumpOS X tries to attack the humanity, but The Person will safe the day with THE TESLA COIL SWORD!

If the enemy is in the area you must shoot it with spacebar

When you kill 10 enemies the tesla coil sword changes it color, the next attack will kill various enemies.

If you attack and there are no enemies in the area of your weapon (Next update I will show the range, I promise...)  the sword lose it power for 1 second.
